scripts.dev: node scripts/timed-run.js "cross-env NODE_ENV=development nest start --watch --builder swc --preserveWatchOutput" "ğŸš€ Desarrollo con hot reload (Development)"
scripts.dev:debug: node scripts/timed-run.js "cross-env NODE_ENV=development nest start --debug --watch --builder swc" "ğŸ› Inicio con debug mode (Development)"
scripts.test:quick: node scripts/timed-run.js "cross-env NODE_ENV=test jest --maxWorkers=4 --bail --passWithNoTests --silent --no-coverage" "ğŸ§ª Tests rÃ¡pidos (Test)"
scripts.test:full: node scripts/timed-run.js "cross-env NODE_ENV=test jest --coverage --maxWorkers=2 --bail --passWithNoTests --silent" "ğŸ“Š Tests completos con coverage (Test)"
scripts.test:debug: node scripts/timed-run.js "node --inspect-brk -r tsconfig-paths/register -r ts-node/register node_modules/.bin/jest --runInBand" "ğŸ› Tests con debug mode"
scripts.test:e2e:quick: node scripts/timed-run.js "cross-env NODE_ENV=test jest --config ./test/jest-e2e.json --maxWorkers=1 --bail --silent --testTimeout=3000" "ğŸš€ E2E tests rÃ¡pidos (Test)"
scripts.test:e2e:full: node scripts/timed-run.js "cross-env NODE_ENV=test jest --config ./test/jest-e2e.json --maxWorkers=1 --bail --silent" "ğŸ“Š E2E tests completos (Test)"
scripts.validate:quick: npm run format && npm run type-check && npm run lint
scripts.validate:full: npm run format && npm run type-check && npm run lint && npm run test:full && npm run test:e2e:full
scripts.start:quick: node scripts/timed-run.js "cross-env NODE_ENV=development nest start --builder swc" "ğŸš€ Inicio rÃ¡pido (Development)"
scripts.start:full: node scripts/timed-run.js "cross-env NODE_ENV=development nest start --watch --builder swc --preserveWatchOutput" "ğŸ”„ Inicio completo con watch (Development)"
scripts.deploy:railway: npm run test:full && npm run build:prod
scripts.deploy:render: npm run test:full && npm run build:prod
scripts.deploy:vercel: npm run test:full && npm run build
